sen.j: 中立売通（なかだちうりどおり）は京都市の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Nakadachiuri-dori Street is one of the east and west street in Kyoto City.
Nakadachiuri-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.
Nakadachiuri-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 京都御苑の中立賣御門から西へ七本松通で一条通に接続する。
sen.e: It runs from Nakadachiuri-gomon Gate at Kyoto Gyoen (Kyoto Imperial Garden) to west and it connects to Ichijo-dori Street at Shichihonmatsu-dori Street.
It runs from Nakadachiuri-gomon Gate at Kyoto Gyoen (Kyoto Imperial Garden) westward and connects Ichijo-dori Street at Shichihonmatsu-dori Street.
It runs from Nakadachiuri-gomon Gate at Kyoto Gyoen (Kyoto Imperial Garden) westward and connects Ichijo-dori Street at Shichihonmatsu-dori Street.

sen.j: 堀川通以西は歩道の整備された2車線の道路であるが、以東は狭い。
sen.e: There is a maintained 2 driveway from Horikawa-dori Street to west, but street to east is narrow.
Two lanes are maintained from Horikawa-dori Street westward, but the street eastward is narrow.
Two lanes are maintained from Horikawa-dori Street westward, but the street eastward is narrow.

sen.j: 烏丸通から油小路通にかけて京都府などの公共機関が多い。
sen.e: There are many public organizations like Kyoto Prefecture from Karasuma-dori Street to Aburakoji-dori Street.
There are many Kyoto Prefecture based public facilities, and others can be found from Karasuma-dori Street to Aburakoji-dori Street.
There are many Kyoto Prefecture based public facilities, and others can be found from Karasuma-dori Street to Aburakoji-dori Street.

sen.j: 中立売通の名称は沿道に、店舗を構えない立ち売りが多かったことに由来するという。
sen.e: The name of Nakadachiuri-dori street is come from the street where many people had businesses without stores.
The name of Nakadachiuri-dori street stems from the fact that many people used to have businesses without storefronts.
The name of Nakadachiuri-dori Street stems from the fact that many people used to have businesses without storefronts.
Public transportation
Public transportation
Public Transportation

sen.j: 堀川通以西は京都市営バスの路線がある。
sen.e: Kyoto City Bus line runs to west from Horikawa-dori Street.
Kyoto City Bus line runs westward from Horikawa-dori Street.
Kyoto City Bus line runs westward from Horikawa-dori Street.

sen.j: これは京都市電北野線の代替となるものである。
sen.e: This is substitution for Kyoto City Railway, Kitano Line.
sen.cmt: 京都市電北野線→Kyoto City Railway, Kitano Line[定訳不明]
sen.e: This substitutes for Kyoto City Railway, Kitano Line.
This substitutes for Kyoto City Railway, the Kitano Line.
sen.cmt: "Kitano Line"→"the Kitano Line"に変更しました。
